truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.question: Have you ever pretended to like something just to fit in? What was it?
What’s the most outrageous thing you’ve convinced someone to believe?
What’s a lie you’ve told to avoid an awkward confrontation?
What’s your most annoying habit?
What’s the most awkward thing you’ve ever said to a stranger?
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve done just to fit in?
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve done when you were alone?
What’s the most spontaneous decision you’ve ever made?

What’s the worst piece of advice you’ve ever received?
What’s a habit of yours that others might find strange or unappealing?
Have you ever pretended to be sick to get out of something? What happened?

What’s your most irrational fear?
What’s the most embarrassing song you know all the lyrics to?
What’s the longest you’ve gone without brushing your teeth?
What’s the longest you’ve gone without speaking to someone you were upset with?
Have you ever forgotten someone’s name mid-conversation? How did you manage it?

What’s your biggest pet peeve?

What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve done while preparing for a date?
Have you ever felt envious of a friend? What made you feel that way?
What’s the most awkward thing you’ve had to explain to someone?
What’s the most embarrassing misunderstanding you’ve had with someone?
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve done out of pure curiosity?
Have you ever walked into a room and immediately regretted it? Why?

What’s the most cringe-worthy item you’ve had to return to a store?

What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve said to someone without realizing they were right behind you?
What’s the strangest thing you’ve ever done with a group of friends?
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve done to avoid running into someone you know?
Have you ever told someone you were “fine” when you clearly weren’t? What happened next?
What’s the most ridiculous overreaction you’ve ever had?
Have you ever tried to befriend someone but it completely backfired? How did it go wrong?
What’s the most uncomfortable question someone’s asked you in public?
What’s the most awkward way you’ve ended a conversation?
What’s the most cringe-worthy thing you’ve done to impress someone?
What’s one thing you only do when you’re by yourself?

Have you ever ghosted a friend? What led to it?

What’s the biggest mistake you’ve ever made?

What’s the grossest smell you secretly enjoy?

When was the last time you shared a toothbrush with someone else?

Share a habit or trait you’re embarrassed about.
Dance to a song chosen by the group for one minute.
Let the group style your hair and keep it that way for the rest of the game.
Do your best impression of someone in the room until someone guesses who it is.
Let someone write a funny message on your arm with a permanent marker.
Wear socks on your hands for the next five rounds.
Share the last photo you took on your phone with the group.
Wear a piece of clothing inside out for the next three rounds.
Let someone tickle you for 30 seconds.
Strut your best runway walk across the room.
Wrap yourself in a blanket and wear it as a cape for the rest of the game.
Lip-sync enthusiastically to a song chosen by someone else.
See how many marshmallows or grapes you can fit in your mouth at once.
Perform a freestyle rap or poem for the group.
Put on a sock puppet show for everyone.
Have a deep conversation with a piece of furniture.
Avoid using the word “like” for the remainder of the game.
truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.punishment: Take a sip everytime you forget or take 4 sips now.

truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.question: Sing all your responses for the next five rounds.
truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.punishment: Take a sip everytime you forget or take 4 sips now.

truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.question: Hold a plank position for one minute.
truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.punishment: Take 2 sips if you fail or 4 sips now

truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.question: Tell each player who you think their celebrity look-alike is.
Act like a chicken until your next turn.
truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.punishment: Take a sip everytime you forget or take 3 sips now.

truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.question: Imitate the way someone in the room walks.
Give someone a piggyback ride around the room.
Pretend to be someone else in the room for two minutes.
truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.punishment: Take a sip everytime you forget or take 3 sips now.

truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.question: Stand on a chair and deliver a dramatic speech about something random.
Put whipped cream on your nose and try to lick it off.
Crack an egg on your head.
Eat a leaf from a plant (make sure it's safe!).
Fill your mouth with water and try not to laugh while the group attempts to make you laugh for 30 seconds.
truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.punishment: Take 2 sips if you fail or 4 sips now

truth-or-dare-cheeky-confessions.question: Let the group treat you like a pet for one minute.
Whisper a secret to the person on your right.
Call a parent and ask for an outrageous amount of money.
Send an embarrassing selfie to the last person you texted.
Play footsie with the person sitting across from you.
Record and post a TikTok dance chosen by the group.
Call the last person you texted and just “meow” into the phone.
Pretend to be the opposite sex for one round.
Read the last text message you sent out loud for everyone to hear.
